com.snakybo.torch.graphics.window

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.graphics.window.Window

  • public final class Window
extends java.lang.Object

    The Window allows for manipulation of the low-level GLFW window.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(DisplayMode displayMode,
                          WindowMode windowMode)

        Create a new window.

        Parameters:
        displayMode - The window properties.
        windowMode - The window mode.

      • focus

        public static void focus()

        Bring the window to the front and give it input focus.

        If the window is currently iconified, this will also call restore().

      • restore

        public static void restore()

        Restore the window from an iconified position.

      • iconify

        public static void iconify()

        Iconify the window.

      • isVSyncEnabled

        public static boolean isVSyncEnabled()

        Check whether or not vsync is enabled.

        Returns:
        Whether or not vsync is enabled.

      • setSize

        public static void setSize(org.joml.Vector2f size)

        Set the size of the window.

        Parameters:
        size - The new size.

      • setVSyncEnabled

        public static void setVSyncEnabled(boolean enabled)

        Enable or disable vsync.

        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether or not to enable vsync.

      • getSize

        public static org.joml.Vector2f getSize()

        Get the size in pixels.

        Returns:
        The size in pixels.

      • getAspectRatio

        public static float getAspectRatio()

        Get the aspect ratio.

        Returns:
        The aspect ratio.

      • getCenter

        public static org.joml.Vector2f getCenter()

        Get the center coordinates.

        Returns:
        The coordinates of the pixel in the center.
